title: Faded
description: Faded is the second book in the Rock Star Trilogy.I left Hope ... the only place I’ve ever felt at home. So now what? Where do I go from here?When I left, I didn’t just leave my home. I left my friends, my sisters, and Stephan… I just found them. I can’t lose them now.I know that I want to do MY music. I need to remember WHY I wanted to play music in the first place. And the only way to get that is by firing my dad, but that may be harder than I thought.On top of everything, I now have cameras following me around everywhere. Even my own home isn’t safe anymore.I’ve come to realize that normal will never be an option for me.
author: Mercy Amare
